description: The salty feta and the sweet beetroot blend into the orzo pasta really well in this recipe.
name: Feta & Beetroot Pasta Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 160g orzo pasta, cooked as per packet instructions
1 medium white onion, peeled and diced

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the orzo pasta as per packet instructions and then drain and set to one side.
Dice the beetroot into small cubes.
Heat up a nonstick pan to a medium heat and then fry the onion, garlic and beetroot for 4 minutes while tossing.
Combine your dressing ingredients and set to one side.
Serve the orzo pasta with the fried vegetables on top, crumble the feta on top and garnish with rocket, seasoning and dressing.
